# zilliz Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "zilliz" {
  cloud_region_id = "gcp-us-west1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloud_region_id` (String) Zilliz Cloud Region Id

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Zilliz API Key
